section.name: Unit 1: An Introduction to Integrated Education and Training Fundamentals
section.summary:
By the end of this unit, you will be able to:

  1. Describe how IET (Integrated Education and Training) can address training, employment, and hiring challenges from the perspectives of an adult learner, career navigator, adult education and workforce training instructor, and employer. 
  2. Define the three required components of an IET program design.
  3. Define a career pathway.

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to complete the application activity.
